downloadTitle: Agents for Microsoft Visual Studio 2013 Language Pack Update 4
downloadDescription: The Agents for Visual Studio 2013 Language Pack is a free add-on that you can use to switch the language that’s displayed in the Agents user interface.
detailsSection:
This download for Agents for Visual Studio 2013.4 Language Pack contains the latest updates. These cumulative updates to Visual Studio 2013 include a variety of bug fixes and capability improvements. For more information, see Visual Studio Updates and the Visual Studio Update KB Article.

The Agents for Visual Studio 2013 Language Pack enables the display of the user interface in different languages. After you install the language pack, you can switch among the languages. Agents for Visual Studio 2013 must be installed before you can install the language pack.
systemRequirementsSection:
Additional Supported Operating Systems for Test Agent:
  • Windows XP Service Pack 3
  • Windows Server 2003 SP2


Hardware Requirements:
  • 1.6 GHz or faster processor
  • 1 GB of RAM for x86
  • 2 GB of RAM for x64
  • 60 MB of available hard disk space
  • DirectX 9-capable video card running at 1024 x 768 or higher display resolution


Additional Requirements:
  • On Windows 8.1 and Windows Server 2012 R2, KB2883200 (available through Windows Update) is required
installInstructionSection:
Before you install a Language Pack, install the corresponding language version of the product.

To download all files and then install:
  • On this page, choose the Download button.
  • Select the .exe options and then choose the Next button.
    • To install the software now, choose the Run button.
    • To install the software later, choose the Save button. (The computer does not have to be connected to the Internet.)
